practice_phrases: That person over there
那边那个人
I asked that person over there
我问那边那个人
That person over there wanted to travel
那边那个人想旅行
That person over there agreed with you
那边那个人同意你
I asked what that person over there wanted to include
我问那边那个人想包括什么
Did you ask if that person over there wanted to travel
你问那边那个人是否想旅行吗
Yes that person over there said she wanted to go
是的那边那个人说她想去
I didn't ask if that person over there wanted to follow
我没问那边那个人是否想跟着
That person over there works with you
那边那个人和你一起工作
That person over there wanted to put it in the garden
那边那个人想把它放在花园里
